oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Regimental listing of soldiers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Regimental listing of soldiers in Morgan's 11th & 15th Virginia Regiments, 1777-1778.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Revolutions; Military officers;
United States--History--Revolution, 1775-1783
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 11th Virginia Regiment was a Continental Army regiment that fought in the American Revolutionary War and was authorized by the Second Continental Congress on 16 September 1776. Both regiments served under Colonel Daniel Morgan.
